thoughts.text: I found the PDF on the Michigan State University Extension website using the 'google' command. I will now use the 'browse_website' command to download the PDF from the website. Once I have downloaded the PDF, I will use the 'read_file' command to extract information about different trees in Michigan.

- Use 'read_file' command to extract information about different trees in Michigan
